Side Effects: Initially had problems with restless leg syndrome and feeling like I couldn't sit still and be comfortable.  This went away and may have been helped had I gradually worked my dosage up.
Comments: I am 39 years old and have had OCD since my early teens.  The most unsettling part of my OCD was the intrusive unwanted thoughts.  This drug has been a miracle for me since the thoughts are 99.9% gone now.  My brilliant psychiatrist tried this with me and it has truly changed my life.

Side Effects: thinning hair_ but otherwise great_ mood is better and picking has almost stopped completely. This has also helped with my anxiety_ and I have NOT had any suicidal thoughts.
